title: InvestorDashboard
description: Schema for investor dashboard data. Follows atomic metric philosophy: only base, non-derivable data is stored. All KPIs are calculated on-demand via kpi-calculations.ts.

run_metadata.description: Immutable metadata for the dashboard run

base_metrics.description: Atomic, non-derivable financial and operational metrics. All KPIs are calculated from these base values.

time_series.description: Historical time series data for charting

valuation.description: Valuation data from multiple methodologies. Implied upside/midpoint are CALCULATED in kpi-calculations.ts, not stored.

scenarios.description: Base, downside, and upside scenarios with probability weights

guidance_bridge.description: Guidance vs consensus tracking. gap_percent is CALCULATED in kpi-calculations.ts.

sources.description: Data sources with refresh status and priority

unit_economics.description: Unit economics with investor context. LTV/CAC ratio and payback are CALCULATED in kpi-calculations.ts.
